definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: From above, we can cue that cocaine has long toxicity effect on CNS.
sentences.chinese: 這提示可卡因的神經毒性作用具有長時程效應。

sentences.english: You can't et C. K. around here anymore.
sentences.chinese: 你在這個地方再也買不到可卡因了。

sentences.english: With stimulants in particular, like meth and cocaine, they suppress the appetite.
sentences.chinese: 成癮性藥物，例如冰毒和可卡因，可以破壞食慾。

sentences.english: And mine boost clothes, sell 'dro, got the blow cheap.
sentences.chinese: 我搶衣服，賣毒品，能搞到便宜的可卡因。

sentences.english: Holmes was partial to cocaine, while Brett needed lithium.
sentences.chinese: 福爾摩斯偏愛可卡因，而佈雷特則需要鋰鹽。

sentences.english: Cocaine is a potent central nervous system stimulant.
sentences.chinese: 可卡因是一種強大的中樞神經系統激動劑。

sentences.english: And the use of cocaine, hallucinogens, steroids, and alcohol by America's youth are all on the decline.
sentences.chinese: 可卡因，迷幻藥，類固醇和酒精的使用也前面下降。

sentences.english: It is like cocaine television that excites everything and speeds everything up.
sentences.chinese: 那就像可卡因電視讓每個人興奮，讓世界加速。

sentences.english: I was actually self- medicating the anxiety from my ADHD with cocaine.
sentences.chinese: 我是真的自我藥物治療的焦慮從我多動症與可卡因。

sentences.english: There is a reason it’s nicknamed “the Crackberry.”
sentences.chinese: 它被別稱爲“可卡因莓”是有原因的。

sentences.english: She even filched it from prescriptions she filled, substituting an anesthetic in its place.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至從她已經用過的藥物處方偷竊可卡因。

sentences.english: Coca is the leaf, and cocaine is the highly manufactured and refined powder.
sentences.chinese: 可卡因是古柯葉經深加工後精製的粉末。

sentences.english: These long-term romantics did, in fact, show cocainelike responses.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，長期的浪漫確實顯示了類似可卡因的反應。

sentences.english: Cocaine and heroin are fast routes to perdition.
sentences.chinese: 可卡因和海洛因是通往地獄的快車道。

sentences.english: Cocain is a kind of drug.
Colvin said the cocaine had apparently been offloaded from the catamaran to the yacht.
sentences.chinese: 科爾文說可卡因顯然是從雙體船卸載到遊艇上。

definition: cocaine (loanword)/also written 可卡因[ke3 ka3 yin1]
